kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
In my limited time interacting with customer journeys I've realized how easy it is to get started with. All Xperience by Kentico users (including developers) should read [our guide on customer journeys](https://docs.kentico.com/x/customer_journeys_guides) because it will clarify which digital marketing questions it will excel at answering.
I'm also really looking forward to adopting the Email Builder for the Kentico Community Portal, which already has many emails, templates, etc...
